column4: genii:I hav tis at terminal.."ganesh@ganesh-desktop:~$" I need to install qwe.rpm file..how can i do this?
Well, first off you shouldn't install foreign package types like rpm if at all possible
There is probably a decent python editor with a package you can install the normal way without using Alien for some rpm file.
i do not program much in python to know what is a good editor for it.
i found a list of install candidates by:   apt-cache search python|grep edit
